title: Water Cycle and Energy Flow
description: An illustration depicting the water cycle and energy flow in a mountainous landscape. The sun is shown emitting yellow rays, representing solar energy. The scene includes a lake, forests, and buildings, with arrows indicating the movement of water vapor and energy. Steam rises from cooling towers, suggesting industrial activity, while clouds form above the mountains, illustrating the process of evaporation and condensation.

title: Hands Holding Recyclable Materials
description: A row of hands raised, each holding different recyclable materials. From left to right, there are a metal can, a glass bottle, a crumpled paper, a plastic bottle, a green glass bottle, a light bulb, an egg carton, and a tin can. The hands vary in skin tones and are wearing different clothing styles.

title: Urban Heat Island Effect
description: An illustration depicting the urban heat island effect, showing a cityscape with various buildings. The image features arrows indicating the sun's rays and heat rising from the buildings, along with wavy lines representing heat emissions. The background includes a layer of clouds, suggesting a temperature difference between the urban area and the surrounding environment.
